snippet: The Institute for Supply Management’s manufacturing index was unchanged in April after falling the previous five months, but building activity slowed.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management reports its manufacturing index was unchanged in April at 51.5; Commerce Dept reports total construction spending in March fell 0.6 percent, to seasonally adjusted $966.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management’s manufacturing index was unchanged in April after falling the previous five months, but building activity slowed.

headline.main: Factory Activity Holds Steady, but Construction Slips
headline.print_headline: U.S. Factory Activity Holds Steady, but Hiring Index Shows Weakness
